p:
“ GBA carriers” included all patients carrying any of the detected nonsynonymous GBA variants. We further split GBA carriers into “polymorphism carriers” (E326K, T369M, or V460L) and “deleterious carriers” (Y135C, N370S, or L444P) as described.
5 We compared between-group differences at baseline using t tests, Mann-Whitney U tests, and χ 2 tests as appropriate.
